li.label: violated the Green Pact
li.description: I broke Y'ffre's sacred covenant by harming plant life. The forest spirits must be angry with me.

li.label: helped forest creature
li.description: I aided one of the forest's children, strengthening the natural bond between all living things.

li.label: proved dominance over predator
li.description: I showed my place at the top of the food chain by defeating a dangerous predator. The wild spirit within me is satisfied.

li.label: fled like prey
li.description: I ran from a fight like a coward. The Hunt within me is ashamed of my weakness.

li.label: successful hunt
li.description: I proved my skill as a hunter worthy of Hircine's attention. The thrill of the chase fills me with pride.

li.label: failed the hunt
li.description: My prey escaped and I have disappointed the Lord of the Hunt. I must do better next time.

li.label: defended sacred forest
li.description: I stood up to protect the forest from those who would harm it. Y'ffre would be proud of my devotion.

li.label: forest lands destroyed
li.description: Sacred woodland was destroyed and I could not prevent it. The spirits of the trees cry out in anguish.

li.label: slept under stars
li.description: I slept beneath the open sky, connected to the natural world as my ancestors did. This is how Bosmer should live.

li.label: ate wild game
li.description: I consumed meat from a creature that lived free in the wild. This connects me to the ancient ways of the hunt.

li.label: used yew bow
li.description: I wielded a bow made from sacred yew wood. The weapon felt perfect in my hands, as if blessed by Y'ffre himself.
